line1.text: Comrade, the streets are on fire, the people demand justice!

line2.text: Yeah, but the boss still owes me three unpaid sandwiches from the factory canteen.

line3.text: Sandwiches ? We are talking about the fall of neoliberalism !

line4.text: Exactly, first the sandwiches, then capitalism. Revolution is built in layers, like a club sandwich.

line5.text: So I shout 'Down with the olygarchy' and you shout...
